title: r/F***youkaren Racist Karen Thinks Only Asians Can Get Corona
description: r/F***youkaren There's stupid, and then there's Karen stupid. In today's episode, an incredibly stupid Karen gets angry at an Asian person for putting on a mask ask Karen approaches. The Karen is shocked to think that an Asian person would be scared of getting the virus from here, a white lady. Apparently, Karen thinks that the virus is as racist as she is!
